import React,{useState} from 'react'
import noteContext from './noteContext'

const NoteState = (props) => {
const notes1 = [
    {
      "_id": "66acd895c49350987e86ba89",
      "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
      "title": "First Note ",
      "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
      "tag": "This is",
      "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:09.158Z",
      "__v": 0
    },
    {
      "_id": "66acd8a0c49350987e86ba8b",
      "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
      "title": "First1 Note ",
      "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
      "tag": "This is",
      "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:20.721Z",
      "__v": 0
    },
    {
      "_id": "66acd8a4c49350987e86ba8d",
      "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
      "title": "First2 Note ",
      "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
      "tag": "This is",
      "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:24.601Z",
      "__v": 0
    },
    {
        "_id": "66acd895c49350987e86ba89",
        "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
        "title": "First Note ",
        "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
        "tag": "This is",
        "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:09.158Z",
        "__v": 0
      },
      {
        "_id": "66acd8a0c49350987e86ba8b",
        "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
        "title": "First1 Note ",
        "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
        "tag": "This is",
        "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:20.721Z",
        "__v": 0
      },
      {
        "_id": "66acd895c49350987e86ba89",
        "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
        "title": "First Note ",
        "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
        "tag": "This is",
        "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:09.158Z",
        "__v": 0
      },
      {
        "_id": "66acd8a0c49350987e86ba8b",
        "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
        "title": "First1 Note ",
        "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
        "tag": "This is",
        "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:20.721Z",
        "__v": 0
      }
  ]
  const [note, setnote] = useState(notes1)

  //Add Notes 
  const addNote = (title , description , tag)=>{
    const note =  {
        "_id": "66acd8a0c49350987e86ba8b",
        "user": "66aa7627257bc137f4a4e45f",
        "title": "First1 Note ",
        "description": "Hello This is My First Note..",
        "tag": "This is",
        "date": "2024-08-02T13:01:20.721Z",
        "__v": 0
      }
    
      setnote(note)
  }
    return (
        <noteContext.Provider value={{note,setnote}}>
            {props.children}
        </noteContext.Provider>
    )
}

export default NoteState
